DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether an intensive, eight session behavioral intervention is superior to standard care in achieving abstinence from cigarettes in smokers living with HIV/AIDS.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial to Test the Efficacy of a Tailored Intensive Smoking Cessation Intervention in Persons With HIV (PWHs)
DOC.criteria: HIVinfection current cigarette smoker high motivation to quit Pregnancy breastfeeding
DOC.keyword: Tobacco use in persons living with HIV/AIDS
